location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Letter from Justin Sheil, at the Camp Lavasaun, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf'

mods.abstract: Letter from Justin Sheil, British Envoy to the Court of Persia, at the Camp Lavasaun, to Major Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, regarding a delivery of indigo to the Agent at Shiraz and the occupation of Bandar Abbas by the Imam of Muscat.
